short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows notifications when Chrome browser updates are available.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Update Checker helps you stay up-to-date with Chrome browser updates by:

• Automatically checking for Chrome updates at configurable intervals
• Showing desktop notifications when updates are available
• Providing quick access to Chrome's update settings
• Allowing manual update checks when needed

Features:
✓ Configurable check intervals
✓ Desktop notifications
✓ One-click access to Chrome update settings
✓ Simple and clean interface
✓ Zero data collection
